document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomy of ' Euconnus complex'. Part XV. Disentangling the Euconnus - Sciacharis knot (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Taxonomy of ' Euconnus complex'. Part XV. Disentangling the Euconnus - Sciacharis knot (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Euconnus ( Maoria ) suturalis (Lea)
;
Franz, 1975 : 163
. Note: not
Scydmaenus suturalis Schaufuss, 1866
(junior secondary homonym in
Euconnus
, but names not now in the same genus).

Euconnus ( Maorinus ) suturalis (Lea)
; as a result of replacing
Maoria
with
Maorinus in Franz, 1980a
.
Maorinus suturalis (Lea)
; implied new combination ex
Euconnus in
Kuschel, 1990 : 76
.
Sciacharis ( Maorinus ) suturalis (Lea)
; Jałoszyński (2014a).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Sciacharis ( Maorinus ) turreti ( Franz, 1975 )
NEW ZEALAND
Euconnus ( Maoria ) turreti Franz, 1975 : 25
. Originally spelled turrethi (p. 25) and
turreti
(p. 108);
turreti
selected as correct original spelling by Jałoszyński (2014a).

Euconnus ( Maorinus ) turreti Franz
; as a result of replacing
Maoria
with
Maorinus in Franz, 1980a
.
Maorinus turreti Franz
; implied new combination ex
Euconnus in Kuschel, 1990 : 76
; Maddison (2010) .
Sciacharis ( Maorinus ) turreti (Franz)
; Jałoszyński (2014a).
